item.title: 期权预示新兴市场股票的优异表现可能会消失
item.description: 对于美国交易者来说，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战搅动美国 500 指数（S&P 500 Index）之际，发展中国家股票一直是令人惊喜的回报来源。但是，如果期权能提供任何指引，这种超额收益可能很快就会成为过去。【原文：For US traders, developing-country stocks have been a surprising source of returns as Donald Trump’s trade war roiled the S&P 500 Index. But if options are any guide, that outperformance may soon be a thing of the past.】

item.description: 据泰国贸易谈判部称，随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普自设的 7 月 9 日最后期限的临近，泰国与美国的关税谈判有可能在实际上进行。【原文：Thailand’s tariff negotiations with the US are likely to take place virtually as President Donald Trump’s self-imposed July 9 deadline nears, according to the Department of Trade Negotiations.】

item.title: 石油价格飙升是受关税影响的全球经济面临的最新阻力
item.description: 对于全年饱受贸易紧张局势冲击的全球经济来说，能源价格下跌是为数不多的利好因素之一。如果以色列对伊朗目标实施空袭后油价持续飙升，那么这一利好因素就会变成另一个利空因素。【原文：For a global economy that’s been buffeted by trade tensions all year, lower energy prices were one of the few positives. If a surge in the price of oil after Israel carried out airstrikes against targets in Iran is sustained, that tailwind will switch to become yet another headwind.】
